title.zh-CN: 使用 汤师爷 简化翻译流程

description.zh-CN: 专为开发团队设计的本地化管理平台，帮助您高效管理多语言项目，无缝协作翻译。
description.en-US: A localization management platform designed for development teams, helping you efficiently manage multilingual projects and collaborate seamlessly.

description.zh-CN: Bondma 提供专业的本地化工具，帮助团队更高效地管理多语言内容
description.en-US: Bondma provides professional localization tools to help teams manage multilingual content more efficiently

description.zh-CN: 支持多种语言，满足全球化需求，实现无缝本地化体验。
description.en-US: Support for multiple languages, meeting global needs with seamless localization experience.

description.zh-CN: 团队成员可同时参与翻译工作，提高效率，保证质量。
description.en-US: Team members can participate in translation work simultaneously, improving efficiency and ensuring quality.

description.zh-CN: 在一个平台上管理多个项目，清晰组织不同项目的翻译资源。
description.en-US: Manage multiple projects on one platform, clearly organizing translation resources for different projects.

description.zh-CN: 支持多种格式导入导出，与现代开发工具链无缝集成。
description.en-US: Support for import/export in multiple formats, seamless integration with modern development toolchains.

description.zh-CN: 精细的权限控制，确保翻译内容的安全和数据隐私。
description.en-US: Fine-grained permission control ensures the security of translation content and data privacy.

description.zh-CN: 完全开源，社区驱动，持续改进优化功能和体验。
description.en-US: Completely open source, community-driven, continuously improving features and experience.

description.zh-CN: 从导入项目到导出翻译，Bondma 提供端到端的本地化管理解决方案
description.en-US: From project import to translation export, Bondma provides end-to-end localization management solutions

description.zh-CN: 简单几步，高效完成导入项目流程
description.en-US: Complete the import project process efficiently in a few simple steps

steps.en-US: Create team and project,Import existing translation files,Automatic language and structure recognition

description.zh-CN: 简单几步，高效完成翻译管理流程
description.en-US: Complete the translation management process efficiently in a few simple steps

steps.en-US: Invite team members,Assign translation tasks,Real-time collaborative editing,Review translation quality

description.zh-CN: 简单几步，高效完成导出与集成流程
description.en-US: Complete the export and integration process efficiently in a few simple steps

steps.en-US: Export files in multiple formats,Integrate with CI/CD processes,Automated deployment updates

description.zh-CN: 看看其他团队如何使用 Bondma 提升本地化效率
description.en-US: See how other teams use Bondma to improve localization efficiency

subtitle.zh-CN: 全球化应用的本地化挑战

quote.zh-CN: "使用 Bondma 后，我们将翻译效率提高了60%，现在可以同时支持20种语言而不增加团队规模。"
quote.en-US: "After using Bondma, we increased our translation efficiency by 60% and now support 20 languages without expanding our team."

subtitle.zh-CN: 多平台内容的一致性管理

quote.zh-CN: "Bondma 帮助我们在多个平台上保持品牌信息的一致性，翻译错误减少了90%。"
quote.en-US: "Bondma helped us maintain brand messaging consistency across multiple platforms, reducing translation errors by 90%."

description.zh-CN: 立即加入 Bondma，体验高效的本地化管理，让您的产品说出全世界的语言。
description.en-US: Join Bondma now and experience efficient localization management, letting your product speak every language in the world.

note.zh-CN: 免费版本包含基本功能，可随时升级
note.en-US: Free version includes basic features, upgradeable anytime
